template: v4l2src device="{source[path]}" ! image/jpeg,width="{caps[width]}",height="{caps[height]}",framerate=30/1 ! decodebin ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! gvadetect model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvaidentify tracker=true ! gvametaconvert source="{source[path]}" name="jsonmetaconvert" add-empty-results=true ! gvametapublish address="{destination[host]}" topic="{destination[topic]}" timeout=1000 ! tee name=t ! queue ! appsink name=appsink t. ! gvawatermark ! queue ! fpsdisplaysink video-sink=ximagesink sync=false
